<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a cage"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/{cageId}/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes the (deployed) cage linked to a collaboration space.  Sadly this does not use the delete verb. This is to keep backwards portability


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"cageId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Id of the collaboration space"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Succesfully deployed cage"},"404":{"description":"Resource could not be found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}},"422":{"description":"Request was semantically incorrect","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
